member.name: DWRITE_FONT_PROPERTY
member.summary: Font property used for filtering font sets and building a font set with explicit properties.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_PROPERTY.propertyId
member.summary: Specifies the requested font property, such as DWRITE_FONT_PROPERTY_ID_FAMILY_NAME.

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_PROPERTY.propertyValue
member.summary: Specifies the value, such as "Segoe UI".

member.name: DWRITE_FONT_PROPERTY.localeName
member.summary: Specifies the locale to use, such as "en-US". Simply leave this empty when used with the font set filtering functions, as they will find a match regardless of language. For passing to AddFontFaceReference, the localeName specifies the language of the property value.
